means: Spektrosk Optika i Spektroskopiya (Russian=Optics and Spectroscopy) （俄语）光学和光谱学
VC开发环境自动生成的用来存放WorkSpace中各种选项的文件。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"选择"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: choose, select, elect, pick, prefer, opt
means: choose ： 普通用词，侧重根据个人意愿和判断从众多的对象中进行选择，着重被选者的优点。
select ： 书面用词，具有庄严、正式的感情色彩。强调精选。
elect ： 指按照一定的规章或法律，用投票等方式进行的认真慎重的选择。
pick ： 口语用词，多指从个人角度仔细挑选，也含任意挑选之意。
prefer ： 强调个人偏爱，不一定有选择的行动。
opt ： 多指在几种可能性之间进行选择。

word_mean: 【动】选择;= Oprating-Program Tape,操作程序带

sentence.Network_en: To keep the cost down, opt for a basic model.
sentence.Network_cn: 要想花钱少些，就选择基本的型号。

sentence.Network_en: Mr Wallace tries to co-opt rather than defeat his critics.
sentence.Network_cn: 华莱士先生竭力拉拢而不是击败他的批评者们。

sentence.Network_en: Under the agreement the Vietnamese can opt out at any time.
sentence.Network_cn: 依据该协定，越南有权随时选择退出。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from French opter, from Latin optare 'choose, wish'

entry.def: If you opt for something, or opt to do something, you choose it or decide to do it in preference to anything else.

example.ex: Depending on your circumstances you may wish to opt for one method or the other...
example.tran: 依据自身情况的不同，你可能希望选择这种或那种方法。

example.ex: Our students can also opt to stay in residence.
example.tran: 我们的学生也可以选择住校。

means.word_mean: 1. select as an alternative; choose instead; prefer as an alternative;

"She opted for the job on the East coast"
